definition: to plan to/to draft (a plan)/to imitate/to assess/to compare/pseudo-
tool/device/utensil/equipment/instrument/talent/ability/to possess/to have/to provide/to furnish/to state/classifier for devices, coffins, dead bodies

sentences.english: This paper discusses the iterative convergence of quasi diagonally dominant matrix with chain of non-zero elements.
sentences.chinese: 討論了擬具非零元素鏈對角佔優矩陣的迭代收斂性。
